members.joinCircumstances: Forced to join at age 10 after Arlong murdered her adoptive mother Bellemère. Promised she could buy back her village for 100 million berries.

keyMoments.title: Arlong Pirates Arrive at Cocoyasi Village
keyMoments.description: Eight years before the present, the Arlong Pirates arrived at Cocoyasi Village and established their tribute system.
keyMoments.significance: The beginning of the crew's tyrannical rule over the Conomi Islands.

keyMoments.title: Arlong Murders Bellemère
keyMoments.description: Arlong executes Bellemère for being unable to pay tribute, demonstrating the crew's ruthlessness.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Arlong Pirates as cruel villains willing to murder innocent people.

keyMoments.title: Nami Forced to Join
keyMoments.description: Arlong forces young Nami to become the crew's cartographer after recognizing her talent.
keyMoments.significance: Gains a skilled navigator through coercion and manipulation.

ships.description: The Arlong Pirates possess at least one ship for their operations.

jollyRoger.description: A sawshark skull with a saw-toothed nose
